Definition: enjoying or showing or marked by joy or pleasure
experiencing or showing sorrow or unhappiness; ; - Christina Rossetti
a member of the genus Canis (probably descended from the common wolf) that has been domesticated by man since prehistoric times; occurs in many breeds
Synonyms: Canis familiaris, andiron, blackguard, bounder, cad
Hyponyms: Belgian griffon, Brussels griffon, Great Pyrenees

Definition: a motor vehicle with four wheels; usually propelled by an internal combustion engine
Synonyms: auto, automobile, cable car, elevator car, gondola

Definition: delighting the senses or exciting intellectual or emotional admiration
a score in baseball made by a runner touching all four bases safely
Synonyms: be given, black market, bleed, break away, bunk
Hyponyms: MOT, MOT test, Ministry of Transportation test

Synonyms: consume, corrode, deplete, eat on, eat up
